backend/main.mo: Actor implements access‑controlled user profiles and CRUD operations for publishers using in‑memory Map storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing dashboard‑related requirements, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference.
frontend/.env: Environment file setting the Internet Identity provider URL.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind layers and OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router and auth gate configuring all application routes and rendering login or app layout based on identity state.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Condu: Modal form for creating or editing trained service meeting conductors with publisher selection and availability fields.
frontend/src/components/conductors/Delet: Confirmation dialog that deletes a conductor using a mutation and shows a loading state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with sidebar, header, routed content, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header bar with menu toggle and logout logic that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Collapsible navigation sidebar with route links, mobile overlay handling, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/notes/AddGlobalN: Modal for creating or editing global notes with category and optional publisher attachment.
frontend/src/components/notes/GlobalNote: Displays a global note with category badge, content preview, date, and edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/AddPion: Modal to add a pioneer by selecting an active publisher and service year, with validation and success toasts.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/DeleteP: Confirmation dialog to delete a pioneer record using a mutation and showing toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/pioneers/EditPio: Modal for editing a pioneer, handling form state, validation, and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/publicWitnessing: Confirmation dialog to delete a trained publisher using a delete mutation.
Modal for creating or editing a trained publisher with form state, validation, and create/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/publishers/AddPu: Modal to add a new publisher with form fields, validation, and create mutation.
frontend/src/components/publishers/EditP: Modal to edit publisher details, initializing fields from existing data and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Edit: Modal for editing a shepherding visit with validation, date handling, and update mutation.
frontend/src/components/shepherding/Reco: Modal for creating a shepherding visit, including form validation, publisher selection, and submission using createVisit mutation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskMod: Modal for adding a new task with fields for title, due date, category, and notes, validating input and submitting via createTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/tasks/EditTaskMo: Modal for editing an existing task, preloading task data and submitting updates through updateTask mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/AddT: Modal for adding a territory with number and type fields, basic validation, and createTerritory mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Chec: Table displaying sorted territory checkout history with optional edit actions and formatted dates.
Modal for checking out a territory by selecting a publisher and campaign flag, submitting via checkOutTerritory mutation.
frontend/src/components/territories/Dele: Confirmation dialog that deletes a territory note using a mutation and shows success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/territories/Edit: Modal for editing a checkout record, handling publisher selection, date conversion, validation, and submitting updates.
Modal for editing a territory’s number and type with validation and update mutation.
Modal for editing a territory note's content and submitting the update.
frontend/src/components/territories/Terr: Card displaying a territory note with edit and delete action buttons.
Section for creating, listing, editing, and deleting territory notes, including composer and modals.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddPublisher.ts: Hook to add a new publisher, mapping UI privilege selections and invalidating publisher queries on success.
Hook to check out a territory to a publisher and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateGlobalNote.t: Hook for creating global notes with validation and invalidating global notes queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreatePioneer.ts: Provides a mutation to create a pioneer and invalidates the pioneers list on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateShepherdingV: Creates a shepherding visit via mutation and refreshes the shepherdingVisits query afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTask.ts: Builds a CreateTaskInput from params, creates a task, and invalidates all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTerritory.ts: Generates an ID, creates a territory through the actor, and invalidates the territories query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedCondu: Adds a trained conductor, invalidates trainedConductors, and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateTrainedPubli: Creates a trained publisher, invalidates trainedPublishers, and displays toast messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteGlobalNote.t: Deletes a global note by ID and invalidates the globalNotes query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePioneer.ts: Deletes a pioneer and invalidates the pioneers query.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeletePublisher.ts: Deletes a publisher with optimistic updates and refetches the publishers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTask.ts: Deletes a task by ID and invalidates all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedCondu: Deletes a trained conductor, invalidates trainedConductors, and shows toast messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeleteTrainedPubli: Deletes a trained publisher, invalidates trainedPublishers, and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalNotes.ts: Provides queries for fetching all global notes or a specific global note by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context/provider and hook for login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublisherNotes.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides queries to fetch all publishers or a specific publisher by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceMeetingCond: Fetches all service meeting conductor assignments.
frontend/src/hooks/useShepherdingVisit.t: Gets, updates, or deletes a single shepherding visit with appropriate cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Queries tasks filtered by status or fetches a single task by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritory.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, updating, deleting, and changing status of territories, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useTerritoryNotes.ts: Hooks to fetch and mutate territory notes, invalidating note queries after changes.
Fetches all trained service meeting conductors via React Query.
Fetches all trained publishers using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateCheckoutReco: Mutation hook to update a territory checkout record and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateGlobalNote.t: Updates a global note and invalidates the global notes query.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePioneer.ts: Updates a pioneer record and refreshes the pioneers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdatePublisher.ts: Updates a publisher's details and privileges, then invalidates the publishers list.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTask.ts: Updates a task and invalidates all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTaskCompleti: Updates task completion status and refreshes all task queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedCondu: Mutates trained conductor data with toast feedback and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpdateTrainedPubli: Updates trained publisher data with toast notifications and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme colors, dark mode variables, and custom utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoon.tsx: UI component displaying a placeholder page for upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard page aggregating publisher, territory, and task stats with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroupProf: Displays details for a specific field service group, including overseer, assistant, and sorted publishers, with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/FieldServiceGroups.ts: Lists all field service groups with their overseer, assistant, and active publishers, linking to individual group profiles.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Provides a login page using Internet Identity with a styled authentication button and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/Notes.tsx: Manages global notes with category filtering, sorting, add/edit/delete modals, and publisher name resolution.
frontend/src/pages/Pioneers.tsx: Displays a table of pioneers with add, edit, and delete functionality, including sorted listing and modal management.
frontend/src/pages/PublicWitnessing.tsx: Shows trained publishers for public witnessing with sorting, add/edit/delete controls, and authorization status.
frontend/src/pages/PublisherProfile.tsx: Displays a single publisher’s profile with privilege badges and supports editing or deleting the record.
frontend/src/pages/Publishers.tsx: Lists all publishers with search and filtering, and provides add, edit, and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceMeetingConduct: Shows trained conductors in a sortable table and supports adding, editing, and deleting conductor records.
frontend/src/pages/Shepherding.tsx: Lists shepherding visits with search, sorting, and actions to record, edit, or delete visits.
frontend/src/pages/ShepherdingVisitProfi: Displays details for a single shepherding visit, allowing note editing, visit editing, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/Tasks.tsx: Tasks page with filtering, add/edit/delete modals, and hooks for fetching and mutating tasks.
frontend/src/pages/Territories.tsx: Lists territories with status coloring, checkout duration logic, highlight rules, and add-territory modal.
frontend/src/pages/TerritoryProfile.tsx: Displays a single territory with edit/delete, checkout management, status actions, and history components.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for converting backend timestamps to formatted date strings across multiple data types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and integrating plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current dashboard-related requirements, including how stats must be computed from publisher, territory, and task backends. Lists existing features, architectural notes, and pending feature requests for the dashboard.
